Extensions/NSSharingService.html#/s:So16.name: sharingMenu(itemToShare:title:icon:)
Extensions/NSSharingService.html#/s:So16.abstract: Creates a Sharing submenu with the given title to share the given text using the available options provided on the machine that the user is running the app on.

Extensions/NSSharingService.html#/s:So16.name: sharingMenu(title:icon:contents:)
Extensions/NSSharingService.html#/s:So16.abstract: Creates a Sharing submenu with the given title to share the given text using the available options provided on the machine that the user is running the app on. The text is generated on-the-fly via a closure when the user selects a menu item.

Extensions/NSSharingService.html.name: NSSharingService
Extensions/NSSharingService.html.abstract: Extends NSSharingService to provide a Sharing Menu on macOS in a SwiftUI multiplatform App. You provide an item to share and the name for the menu item to share or a completion that get’s called when the user selects a menu item to provide the data to share, on-the-fly.

Classes/SharingSheetItem.html#/title.name: title
Classes/SharingSheetItem.html#/title.abstract: Holds the optional title for the item being shared.

Classes/SharingSheetItem.html#/placehold.name: placeholder
Classes/SharingSheetItem.html#/placehold.abstract: Holds an optional, simple, placeholder for the object being shared. This should only be used for items that are very complex.

Classes/SharingSheetItem.html#/data.name: data
Classes/SharingSheetItem.html#/data.abstract: The actual data that is being shared by the user.

Classes/SharingSheetItem.html#/init(data.name: init(data:title:placeholder:)
Classes/SharingSheetItem.html#/init(data.abstract: Initializes a new instance of the object.

Classes/SharingSheetContentProvider.html.name: titleContent
Classes/SharingSheetContentProvider.html.abstract: The type of a title content provider

Classes/SharingSheetContentProvider.html.name: title
Classes/SharingSheetContentProvider.html.abstract: Holds the optional title for the item being shared.

Classes/SharingSheetContentProvider.html.name: placeholder
Classes/SharingSheetContentProvider.html.abstract: Holds an optional, simple, placeholder for the object being shared. This should only be used for items that are very complex.

Classes/SharingSheetContentProvider.html.name: data
Classes/SharingSheetContentProvider.html.abstract: The actual data that is being shared by the user.

Classes/SharingSheetContentProvider.html.name: init(data:title:placeholder:)
Classes/SharingSheetContentProvider.html.abstract: Initializes a new instance of the object.

Classes/SharingSheet.html#/openSheet(ite.name: openSheet(itemsToShare:activities:animated:fromX:fromY:)
Classes/SharingSheet.html#/openSheet(ite.abstract: Opens a Share Sheet for the provided list of items.

Classes/SharingSheet.html#/openPrintShee.name: openPrintSheet(textToShare:font:color:activities:animated:fromX:fromY:)
Classes/SharingSheet.html#/openPrintShee.abstract: Opens a Share Sheet for the provided text with the option to print the text using a simple style (UISimpleTextPrintFormatter).

Classes/SharingSheet.html#/openMarkdownP.name: openMarkdownPrintSheet(markdown:activities:animated:fromX:fromY:)
Classes/SharingSheet.html#/openMarkdownP.abstract: Opens a Share Sheet for the provided text with the option to print the text (which has been formatted in Markdown) using a simple style (UISimpleTextPrintFormatter).

Classes/SharingSheet.html#/openMarkdownP.name: openMarkdownPrintSheet(markdown:simpleText:activities:animated:fromX:fromY:)
Classes/SharingSheet.html#/openMarkdownP.abstract: Opens a Share Sheet for the provided text with the option to print the text (which has been formatted in Markdown) using a simple style (UISimpleTextPrintFormatter).

Classes/SharingSheet.html#/activityViewC.name: activityViewControllerPlaceholderItem(_:)
Classes/SharingSheet.html#/activityViewC.abstract: Returns the placehold for the item being shared.

Classes/SharingSheet.html#/activityViewC.name: activityViewController(_:itemForActivityType:)
Classes/SharingSheet.html#/activityViewC.abstract: Returns the data for the item being shared.

Classes/SharingSheet.html#/activityViewC.name: activityViewController(_:subjectForActivityType:)
Classes/SharingSheet.html#/activityViewC.abstract: Returns the subject for the item being shared.

Classes/SharingSheet.html#/openSheet(ite.name: openSheet(itemToShare:activities:animated:fromX:fromY:)
Classes/SharingSheet.html#/openSheet(ite.abstract: Opens a Share Sheet for the given item.

Classes/SharingSheet.html#/openSheet(ite.name: openSheet(itemToShare:title:placeholder:activities:animated:fromX:fromY:)
Classes/SharingSheet.html#/openSheet(ite.abstract: Opens a Share Sheet for the given item, title and placeholder.

Classes/SharingSheet.html.name: SharingSheet
Classes/SharingSheet.html.abstract: Presents a standard UIKit Share Sheet from within a SwiftUI View on iOS or iPad OS. Automatically handles placing the sheet into a Popover on iPadOS.

Classes/SharingSheetContentProvider.html.name: SharingSheetContentProvider
Classes/SharingSheetContentProvider.html.abstract: Provides data to be shared via a series of callbacks for data, title and placeholder to support different data for different types of sharing activites (UIActivity.ActivityType).

Classes/SharingSheetItem.html.name: SharingSheetItem
Classes/SharingSheetItem.html.abstract: Holds information about a piece of data to be shared via a SharingSheet.
